definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: Fruit-of Wudang Mountain in prestigious Ming Dynasty Wudang Mountain is the rare plant.
sentences.chinese: 武當山榔梅果在明代享有盛譽，是武當山的稀有植物。

sentences.english: It is a useful method to utilize phages in selective isolation of rare actinomyces.
sentences.chinese: 利用噬菌體是一種有效分離稀有放線菌的方法。

sentences.english: Just like platinum, its rarity gives it a whooping value.
sentences.chinese: 就像鉑金，其稀有性使得它百日咳的價值。

sentences.english: This forest is abundant in rare mushrooms.
sentences.chinese: 這座森林充滿許多稀有的蕈類。

sentences.english: Sea weed extract is neither a rare nor expensive ingredient.
sentences.chinese: 海藻萃取液是一種既非稀有也不昂貴的成分。

sentences.english: Before De Kesi sends her, film toward Africa one of these day the photograph of rare falcon.
sentences.chinese: 某天德克斯派她前往非洲拍攝稀有獵鷹的照片。

sentences.english: Epaulette sharks are not among the rare species.
sentences.chinese: 肩章鯊魚不屬於稀有物種。

sentences.english: This kind of rare animal will be protected by the laws two years late.
sentences.chinese: 兩年後，此種稀有動物將被法律保護。

sentences.english: That is when we like to buy rare and exquisite products.
sentences.chinese: 那就是我們喜歡去買的那些稀有和精緻的商品。

sentences.english: Therarity bias is also sometimes called a" nonconformist bias".
sentences.chinese: 罕見稀有偏好有時也被稱爲“非從衆偏好”。

sentences.english: Such lost worlds are vanishingly rare.
sentences.chinese: 這樣消逝的世界正在悄無聲息地變得稀有起來。

sentences.english: Soon it will be hard to find the Blue Men of the Sahara.
sentences.chinese: 不久，撒哈拉沙漠的藍人將成爲一道稀有的風景線。

sentences.english: Booth gram Si scores point belongs to the rare phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 相比於博揚，布斯克斯進球屬於稀有現象。

sentences.english: This is ionic radii with a noble gas configuration.
sentences.chinese: 這是稀有氣體的離子半徑。

sentences.english: There are rare animals in Australia , for instance, koalas and duckbills.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲有稀有動物，例如考拉熊和鴨嘴獸。

sentences.english: Buyers like these apartments as they are similar to rare jewellery.
sentences.chinese: 買家喜歡這些公寓，它們就像稀有的珠寶一樣。

definition: best quality/item of the highest quality/(slang) outrageous/annoying in the extreme/gross/person with these qualities
rare/not familiar (to the speaker)/sth rarely experience/hard to see
the rarer sth is, the greater its value (idiom)
